mathematica: q = 28; Join[{a = 1}, Table[a = (q - n)*a/(n + 1), {n, 0, q - 1}]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 10 2011 *)
prog: (Sage) [binomial(28, n) for n in range(29)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 21 2009](MAGMA) [Binomial(28, n): n in [0..28]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 12 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
